text: @realDonaldTrump @POTUS Ass hole U have 42 Million jobs lost, Deficit through the roof to keep market up, 107,000 Covid-19 American Deaths, 1.8M cases, Innocent Black men being killed by Police, children taken from Mothers, Chaos in the WH as well as the Streets, America going down toilet because of you
